text: Hi! my studio Variable specialising in data art and generative design is looking for an intern. We use our in house visual programming tool called <http://Nodes.io|Nodes.io> so i think it might be relevant here.  Please share if you know anybody who might be interested or hit me with questions <https://twitter.com/marcinignac/status/1541783394132058121>

attachments.fallback:
<https://twitter.com/marcinignac|@marcinignac>: Are you a graphic designer or artist who wants to expand their toolset with code? Would you like to use computation and algorithms to create stunning visuals and bring your designs to life?

We would love you to join <https://twitter.com/variable_io|@variable_io> team! 
<https://variable.io/jobs/>

See below why  /1 <https://pbs.twimg.com/media/FWV-qsZXkAAy8fm.jpg>
